MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CollectionChanged As CollectionChangeEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the collection changes.

span.span: Occurs when the collection changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks コレクションの変更には、列の追加や削除などがあります。Examples of collection changes include additions or removals of columns. イベント処理の詳細については、次を参照してください。 [NIB: イベントの利用](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)です。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 次のコード例では、このメンバーの使用方法を示します。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 例では、イベント ハンドラーは発生するときに報告、イベント。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. このレポートでは、イベントが発生し、デバッグに役立つを学習するのに役立ちます。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 複数のイベントまたは頻繁に発生するイベントを報告するための交換を検討でまたはメッセージを複数行に追加するです。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . コード例を実行する型のインスタンスを含むプロジェクトに貼り付けることという`DataGridViewColumnCollection1`です。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridViewColumnCollection1`. イベント ハンドラーが関連付けられていることを確認してください、イベント。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#372)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#372)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn GetFirstColumn(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates includeFilter) cil managed
Public Function GetFirstColumn (includeFilter As DataGridViewElementStates) As DataGridViewColumn

param.name: includeFilter
param.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the filter for inclusion.

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the filter for inclusion.

summary.span: Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter requirements.

span.span: Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter requirements.

returns.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

span.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初の列の表示順序には、最下位の列は、列が実際に画面に表示するかどうかに関係なく、値。The first column in display order is the column with the lowest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. このメソッドを使用して、インデックス値を直接比較することがなく、指定した条件に一致する最初の列を判断できます。This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly. ## Examples 次のコード例では、メソッドを最初に表示される列と表示されている最後の列を交換します。The following code example uses the method to swap the first displayed column and the last displayed column. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#170)]

exception.span: is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

span.span: is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

span.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初の列の表示順序には、最下位の列は、列が実際に画面に表示するかどうかに関係なく、値。The first column in display order is the column with the lowest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. このメソッドを使用して、インデックス値を直接比較することがなく、指定した条件に一致する最初の列を判断できます。This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 次の列の表示順序は、最下位の列は、よりも大きな値、列が実際に画面に表示するかどうかに関係なく、指定された列の値。The next column in display order is the column with the lowest value higher than the value of the specified column, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. このメソッドを使用して、インデックス値を直接比較することがなく、指定した条件に一致する現在の列の後、次の列を確認できます。This method lets you determine the next column after the current column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn GetPreviousColumn(class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn dataGridViewColumnStart, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates includeFilter, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates excludeFilter) cil managed
Public Function GetPreviousColumn (dataGridViewColumnStart As DataGridViewColumn, includeFilter As DataGridViewElementStates, excludeFilter As DataGridViewElementStates) As DataGridViewColumn

param.name: dataGridViewColumnStart
param.span: The column from which to start searching for the previous column.

span.span: The column from which to start searching for the previous column.

param.name: includeFilter
param.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represent the filter to apply for inclusion.

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represent the filter to apply for inclusion.

param.name: excludeFilter
param.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represent the filter to apply for exclusion.

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represent the filter to apply for exclusion.

summary.span: Gets the last column prior to the given column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.

span.span: Gets the last column prior to the given column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.

returns.span: The previous column that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

span.span: The previous column that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示の順序で前の列は、最高の値を持つ列未満の値、列が実際に画面に表示するかどうかに関係なく、指定された列の値。The previous column in display order is the column with the highest value lower than the value of the specified column, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. このメソッドを使用して、インデックス値を直接比較することがなく、指定した条件に一致する現在の列の前に、最初の列を判断できます。This method lets you determine the first column before the current column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.

span.span: At least one of the filter values is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks イベントを発生させると、イベント ハンドラーがデリゲートから呼び出されます。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 詳細については、次を参照してください。[処理とイベントの発生](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)です。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). メソッドを使用すると、デリゲートを結び付けずに、派生クラスでイベントを処理することもできます。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 派生クラスでイベントを処理する場合は、この手法をお勧めします。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 派生クラスで をオーバーライドする場合は、登録されているデリゲートがイベントを受け取ることができるように、基本クラスの メソッドを呼び出してください。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

Docs.exception:
The associated control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
The associated control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:

- Clearing the selection.Clearing the selection.
